channel.title: Duel Arena Help!
channel.description:
Hello guys i ran into a problem on my 07 Rsps, Im using the source OS-Legacy. Im having trouble when i duel someone it works fine and all that, all the duel inside works good and we get our items but when we get done and the duel is over it puts in the same spot and we cant move, We gotta we log and then we can move please help!!
Skype:tyty43095

item.title: Duel Arena Help!
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

Does this happen for every duel, or only duels that don’t allow players to move inside the duel arena?

In the second case, similar to what X-J-K-X said, you might not be re-enabling the players capability to move.

Read full topic

item.title: Duel Arena Help!
item.dc:creator: @X-J-K-X X-J-K-X
item.description:
@X-J-K-X wrote:

Something is preventing the player’s position changing, or you don’t have it moving the players at all. Check the code responsible for handling the end of a duel.

Read full topic
